College_Name: Shobhit (Deemed to be University) Campus - Powered by Sunstone's Edge, Meerut
College_Summary: Shobhit (Deemed to be University) is a self-financed private university located in Meerut, UP. The University is UGG recognised, offering both Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in the fields of Management and Computer Applications for the students. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in national level management entrance exams such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ NMAT etc. Graduates from the University are placed in top-notch companies such as Accenture, Godrej, TATA, Mahindra, Byjus, Amazon, Infosys etc.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in General Management [PGDM]

College_Name: College of Traffic Management - Institute of Road Traffic Education - (CTM-IRTE), Haryana
College_Summary: CTM-IRTE, Haryana was established in the year of 1991 and is the product of 31 years of extensive research and studies across the country. CTM is the only single umbrella facility for training and research in all domains of traffic management. It is a leading Science college in Faridabad affiliated with Maharshi Dayanand University (MDU), Rohtak for Postgraduate courses. All the relevant programs are approved by the Department of Higher Education, Haryana. It offers 2 different courses across the science stream. The top recruiters of the Institute of Road Traffic Education are Intercontinental Consultants & Technocrats Pvt. Ltd., VR Techniche Consultants PVT LTD, etc.

Max Healthcare Education Vaishali, Ghaziabad
College_Summary: Max Healthcare Education is a part of Max Healthcare Institute Limited (Max Healthcare) which is one of India’s leading providers of integrated world-class healthcare services. It has a network of 17 state-of-the-art, patient-centric healthcare facilities (3400+ beds) spread across the National Capital Region (NCR) and states of Punjab, Uttarakhand, and Maharashtra. Hospital’s Allied Healthcare courses provide the students with the skills, information, and competencies they need to conduct a variety of medical procedures and grab employment opportunities in the healthcare sector. Max Healthcare Education offers Certification, Diploma and B.Sc courses in various disciplines at the undergraduate level. The technical role and scope in the healthcare business are better understood through live interaction sessions with doctors and professionals. The highest placement package offered to Max Healthcare Education’s students is INR 3.6 LPA. Students are placed in reputable hospitals for clinical posting under the supervision of doctors, technicians, and faculty.

Great Lakes Center of Online Learning- Gurgaon
College_Summary: Great Lakes Online Learning, was established in 2004 with locations in Gurgaon and Chennai. Great Lakes Institutes of Management is one of the premier and top B schools in India that aims to develop innovative, cost-effective, and accessible programs. Great Lakes is NBA approved and has been ranked in the top-5 emerging B –schools by NHRDN in 2019. Great Lakes offers an online Post Graduate Diploma in Management program (PGDM), an AICTE approved 24 months program. Led by an exceptional faculty, the Great Lakes Institute of Management programs facilitate extensive engagement and provide students access to perspectives of CXOs, policymakers, and entrepreneurs. In 2014, Great Lakes, Chennai, was accredited by the Association of MBAs (AMBA, UK) and became the youngest Indian B-School to receive this prestigious international recognition. Great Lakes also received the international SAQS accreditation from AMIDSA within a year of the AMBA recognition.

Maharaja Agrasen Business School- MABS, New Delhi

British Columbia College of Management, Greater Noida
College_Summary: British Columbia College of Management is an Uttar Pradesh based distinguished private college which came into existence in 2022 by a group of highly experienced and seasoned professionals from the Hotel and Education industries and offers a broad range of Undergraduate, Diploma, Advanced Diploma and Postgraduate Diploma in the discipline of Hotel and Hospitality Management and Business Administration. The college has collaborated with top-notch brands, foreign institutes including Coventry University, Birchwood University, Europe Institute of Management and Technology and College De Paris along followed by NAAC-A graded UGC approved University for students skills enhancement and providing them the best quality education. Also admission to college’s courses is granted based on the marks of candidates in last year’s qualifying exam and students will also get the option to study abroad in 2nd and 3rd year along with a 3-years work permit.

College_Summary: Ishan Educational Institutions, Greater Noida, established in 1994, is the First College of Greater Noida. The institute offers BBA, B.Com, B.Com (Hons), B.A.M.S, B.Ed., LLB, B.A. + LLB and B.Pharma Courses at the undergraduate level and offers M.Com, M.Ed. and L.L.M. courses at the postgraduate level. The institute also offers Diploma courses in Education. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the entrance exam or based on merit in the previous qualifying exam. The highest placement package offered to Ishan Educational Institute’s students is INR 15 LPA.

College_Name: Wisdom School of Management, Ghaziabad
College_Summary: Wisdom School of Management is one of the leading Management Institutes having vast and deep experience in counselling students for Distance Learning & Online Programs. It was established in the year 2006 and working under the aegis of WISDOM SCHOOL OF MANAGEMENT TRUST and certified for its quality management systems by ISO 9001:2015 and accredited by IAS and IAF. The Business School offers BA, BBA, B.Com, B.Com (Hons), BMLT, BCA, BJMC, B.Sc, B.Lib.I.Sc and B.Tech courses at the undergraduate level and offers MSW, MA, MBA, M.Com, MCA, MJMC, M.Sc, M.Tech and M.Lib.I.Sc at the postgraduate level. The management school also offers Diploma and PG Diploma courses in various disciplines at the UG and PG level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in entrance exam or merit in the previous qualifying exam.

College_Name: Ishan Ayurvedic Medical College and Research Centre, Greater Noida
College_Summary: Ishan Ayurvedic Medical College is a private institute which came into existence in 2017. The institute is a constituent college of Ishan Educational Institutions and is affiliated to MGG AYUSH University , Gorakhpur. The college offers a B.A.M.S course at the undergraduate level. Admission to the course will be done based on the candidate’s performance in NEET. The institute has been best rated for the Highest Return on Investment (RoI) because of low fee structure and good placements. Ishan Ayurvedic Medical College is also rated among the Top 5 because of Practical Exposure, Curricular and Co-curricular activities.

The flagship program of this school is Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) combined with UG Program in Software Engineering, surpasing a traditional BCA degree. This curriculum provides students with up to 1.5 years of work experience through internships and project work, in addition to a degree.

College_Name: Indian Institute of Printing and Packaging Technology, Greater Noida

College_Name: Academy of Pastry and Culinary Arts, Gurgaon
College_Summary: Academy of Pastry and Culinary Arts is a Gurgaon based esteemed private institution which was founded in 2015 and offers a wide variety of Undergraduate, Advanced Diploma and Certification courses across various disciplines like Tourism Studies, Culinary Arts and Pastry and Bakery etc. The Academy is approved by City & Guilds UK and Tourism and Hospitality Skill Council. Admission to the institute’s programs is granted to aspiring students depending on their last year qualifying exam and candidates should also possess a basic knowledge of English language.

IIM Sambalpur Delhi Campus
College_Summary: IIM Sambalpur is one of the Baby IIMs in the country. IIM Sambalpur has set up its Campus at Vasant Kunj, New Delhi. IIM Sambalpur Delhi Campus offers a 2-Year, MBA Program in blended mode, designed for Working Professionals. Candidates with a Bachelor’s Degree are eligible to apply for the Program. IIM Sambalpur Delhi Campus MBA fees is INR 14 Lakhs.

College_Name: Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism, Gurgaon, Haryana
College_Summary: Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism is a prestigious Private institute in Gurgaon and was founded in 2008 to produce outstanding and globally relevant professionals for the Media, Management, and Technology industry. The college is affiliated with The Northcap University of Gurgaon and has received an ‘A’ grade from NAAC. Seamedu offers a wide range of Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma, and Certificate programs across disciplines such as Science, Arts, Journalism, Film Making, Game Development, Computer Applications, Business Administration etc. Master Classes on Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality are also conducted, wherein students are taught how to build simple applications for mobile devices.

College_Name: Indian Institute of Gems & Jewellery - [IIGJ], New Delhi
RMS Business School, Gurgaon, Haryana
College_Summary: RMS Business School is a Gurgaon-based college that came into existence in 2007 under the aegis of Rao Neki Ram Memorial Colleges. It offers MBA and PG Diploma programs across disciplines such as Human Resource Management, Financial Management, Supply Chain Management, Marketing Management, Healthcare and Hospitality Management, Aviation Management, etc. The college is approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD - Government of India, affiliated to Gurugram University and accredited by the NBA, NAAC with an A++ grade, and American professional and accreditation organization Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business, also known as AACSB. Admission to RMS courses is granted to aspiring students based on their merit and overall academic records in the previous year’s qualifying exam, and scores of entrance tests such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ CMAT/ GMAT/ ATMA. Group discussions and personal interviews are also conducted by the Admission Committee to shortlist applicants.
